旉字的基本解释

旉
fū
古同“敷”：“朱明盛长，旉与万物。”

旉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fū］
同“敷1”。
(1)花朵。
(2)普遍。
(3)铺布；散布。

旉字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【方字部】　旉； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页483第15
【篇海】古文敷字。【易·說卦】震爲旉。【疏】取其春時氣至，草木皆吐，旉布而生也。餘詳攴部十一畫。

旉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
旉字的起名意思

暂无。

Shame
Basic explanation of words
Shame
fū
The ancient same "supplement": "Zhu Ming is prosperous and long, and everything is connected."
Shame
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fū］
Same as "Apply 1".
(1) Flowers.
(2) Universal.
(3) Spread; spread.
Shame
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Jixia] [Fangzi Department] 　旉; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 483 No. 15
【Panhai】Ancient texts apply words. [Easy·Said Gua] Shocking is a shame. 【Sparse】Take the spring when the breath is up, the vegetation will vomit, and it will be born out of cloth. There are eleven paintings in Yu Xiangchou's department.
